general_advisory: Vaccination should be given with tablet for worms. Provide calcium, magnesium and salts along with fodder crops to the animals in these days.

advisory: For high yielding paddy varieties, apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage. For hybrids apply 42 kg of Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage. Keeping in view of present weather, farmers are advised to monitor crop regularly for blast, leaf folder or stem borer in paddy crop.
For Red rot and wilt disease, spray the crop with Mancozeb 0.3% or carbendazim 0.1% or Azoxystrobin 18.2%SC/ Difenoconazole 11.45SC @ 1ml per liter water in dry days.
In vegetables (brinjal, tomato etc), for monitoring of borer insect, farmers are advised to use pheromone trap @ 3-4/acre.
In vegetables (brinjal, tomato etc), for monitoring of borer insect, farmers are advised to use pheromone trap @ 3-4/acre.
